remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何启用中的拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates how to enable drag-and-drop operations within a control. 在示例中，任何节点可以拖动到另一个节点不被拖动节点的后代。In the example, any node can be dragged to another node that is not a descendant of the dragged node. 包括的所有子代节点，则拖动的节点将成为目标节点的子节点。The dragged node, including all of its descendant nodes, becomes a child of the destination node. 使用鼠标左键时，被拖动的节点移动到目标节点。When the left mouse button is used, the dragged node is moved to the destination node. 使用鼠标右键时，拖动的节点复制到目标节点。When the right mouse button is used, the dragged node is copied to the destination node.
